description: This file defines API routes related to user management within a FastAPI application. It includes endpoints for listing, creating, and deleting users, implementing role-based access control using dependencies and security policies.

methods.name: list_users
methods.description: Endpoint to list users with read permissions enforced via role requirements.

methods.name: create_user
methods.description: Endpoint to create a user, requires write permissions.

methods.name: delete_user
methods.description: Endpoint to delete a user, requires admin permissions.
